comment:
* Member is an interface that reflects identifying information about
 * a single member (a field or a method) or a constructor.
 *
 * @see java.lang.Class
 * @see Field
 * @see Method
 * @see Constructor
 *
 * @author Nakul Saraiya
 * @since 1.1

variables.name: PUBLIC
variables.comment:
* Identifies the set of all public members of a class or interface,
     * including inherited members.

variables.name: DECLARED
variables.comment:
* Identifies the set of declared members of a class or interface.
     * Inherited members are not included.

methods.name: public Class<?> getDeclaringClass()
methods.comment:
* Returns the Class object representing the class or interface
     * that declares the member or constructor represented by this Member.
     *
     * @return an object representing the declaring class of the
     * underlying member

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the simple name of the underlying member or constructor
     * represented by this Member.
     *
     * @return the simple name of the underlying member

methods.name: public int getModifiers()
methods.comment:
* Returns the Java language modifiers for the member or
     * constructor represented by this Member, as an integer.  The
     * Modifier class should be used to decode the modifiers in
     * the integer.
     *
     * @return the Java language modifiers for the underlying member
     * @see Modifier

methods.name: public boolean isSynthetic()
methods.comment:
* Returns {@code true} if this member was introduced by
     * the compiler; returns {@code false} otherwise.
     *
     * @return true if and only if this member was introduced by
     * the compiler.
     * @jls 13.1 The Form of a Binary
     * @since 1.5
